fields.label: Label
fields.description: Label to identify the transcript with. Not relevant if you only have one transcript file.

fields.label: Language code
fields.description: The transcript library will try to automatically determine the language of the transcription text as information for screen readers. If that fails, you can manually set the "BCP 47 language tag" - e.g. "en" for English, "nb" for Norwegian bokm√•l, etc.

fields.label: Maximum number of lines
fields.description: Maximum number of transcript lines that should be displayed at once. If left out or 0, will display complete transcript.

fields.label: Show transcript on load
fields.description: You can select whether the transcript should be shown when the content is loaded or not.

fields.label: Chapter marks
fields.description: You can optionally add chapter marks in common mp4chaps format. The syntax is "hh:mm:ss Chapter title" or "hh:mm:ss.MMM Chapter title"

fields.label: No medium provided
fields.default: No medium was assigned to the transcript.

fields.label: Problem with WebVTT file
fields.default: There seems to be something wrong with the WebVTT file. Please consult the browser's development console for more information.

fields.label: Autoscroll inactive
fields.default: Turn on autoscroll. Currently not active.

fields.label: Start time inactive
fields.default: Show start time. Currently not shown.

fields.label: Line breaks inactive
fields.default: Show line breaks. Currently not shown.
